charaepi_ch0107_00_dent/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] went around the
markets in town with Cilan.
charaepi_ch0107_00_dent/2301_1101_0200_2:
They found some rare tea leaves and bought
the last pack.
charaepi_ch0107_00_dent/2301_1201_0300_1:
We sure lucked out! They don’t sell this sort
of tea in Unova, so I’m looking forward to
tasting it!
charaepi_ch0107_00_dent/2301_1201_0400_1:
Apparently they’re fermented leaves that
Pokémon like.
charaepi_ch0107_00_dent/2301_1201_0600_1:
That must mean these leaves are on the
bitter side.
charaepi_ch0107_00_dent/2301_0401_0800_1:
The leaves on Simisage’s head are really
bitter, so I figured!
charaepi_ch0107_00_dent/2301_0402_1000_1:
Not really, but the leaves on his head are
really bitter, so I thought there might be a
connection there!
charaepi_ch0107_00_dent/2301_1201_1100_1:
Before he evolved, he was a Pansage with
leaves that could relieve fatigue.
charaepi_ch0107_00_dent/2301_1201_1200_1:
I wonder—when it evolves, does even its
leaves’ flavor mature?
charaepi_ch0107_00_dent/2301_1201_1300_1:
As they say, the longer you live, the more
you’ll have tasted both the bitter and the
sweet.
charaepi_ch0107_00_dent/2301_0401_1500_1:
It may take you a while to appreciate
sour and bitter flavors.
charaepi_ch0107_00_dent/2301_0302_1600_1: I wanna try more mature flavors, too!
charaepi_ch0107_00_dent/2301_0402_1700_1:
Good idea. I, Cilan, can help by making you
the finest teas.
charaepi_ch0107_00_dent/2301_1201_1800_1:
We’re still budding as Trainers—and even as
people.
charaepi_ch0107_00_dent/2301_1201_1900_1:
I’ve been training hard with my brothers so
we can all be full-fledged Gym Leaders on
our own.
charaepi_ch0107_00_dent/2301_1201_2000_1:
It makes me wonder how our flavors will
have changed when we return to the
Striaton City Gym!
charaepi_ch0107_00_dent/2301_0401_2200_1: Thank you. I’m looking forward to it, too.
charaepi_ch0107_00_dent/2301_0402_2400_1: Ahahaha! That’s an interesting way to put it!
charaepi_ch0107_00_dent/2301_0402_2500_1:
You’re not wrong, though! Putting time and
care into something is sure to help bring out
its flavor!
charaepi_ch0107_00_dent/2301_1201_2600_1:
Hm? Oh, you want to know what I want to
do? Well...
charaepi_ch0107_00_dent/2301_1201_2700_1:
I want to become the kind of adult that
appreciates bitter things, too... Like this tea
and Simisage’s leaves!
